data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
To my knowledge Math::ODE is the only perl module dedicated to
    solving ODE's. The main differences between Math::ODE and
    PDL::RungeKutta are: 1. PDL::RungeKutta handles piddles making
    easier solving high order equations. 2. PDL::RungeKutta uses
    adaptive stepsize which allows error control.
